title: Fan, late 19th century
description: Mount is painted on the obverse with a bull fighting scene showing a man leaping over a bull on a pole. The reverse has a man and two women in conversation. Sticks are mother-of-pearl carved à jour. Paste head on pin. White cord and tassel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: painted silk (mount); mother-of-pearl (sticks). Bequest of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-6-122.
